original: ERIKSSON, Karl Erik Ragnar, Civilingenjör, Torshälla, f Borg, Ögl, 3/11 11 av ing E E o Elin Bäckman, gm Hagar Flygare. KTH (mek tekn) 35. Inneh fma Erik Eriksson J:or Verktygsmaskiner (tillv verkt.maskin o spec.-maskin).
translated: ERIKSSON, Karl Erik Ragnar, Civil Engineer, Torshälla, born in Borg, Ögl, on 3/11 11 to parents Erik Eriksson and Elin Bäckman, married to Hagar Flygare. Graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology (mechanical engineering) in 1935. Occupied in the company Erik Eriksson J:or Verktygsmaskiner (manufacturing of machine tools and specialized machines).

worksFor.name: Erik Eriksson J:or Verktygsmaskiner
worksFor.description: Manufacturing of machine tools and specialized machines

career.industry: Manufacturing of machine tools and specialized machines
